sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měi zhōumò dōu qù dǎ lánqiú.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais jouer au basket-ball chaque week-end.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I go play basketball every weekend.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiān chīfàn, jiēzhe qù sànbù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je mange d'abord, puis je vais me promener.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I eat first, then go for a walk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó báijiǔ hěn liè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'alcool blanc chinois est très fort.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese baijiu is very strong.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shàngkè shí yào rènzhēn zuò bǐjì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut prendre des notes attentivement en classe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should take notes carefully during class.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 小心坏人，不要跟陌生人走。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiǎoxīn huàirén, bùyào gēn mòshēngrén zǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Méfie-toi des méchants, ne pars pas avec des inconnus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beware of bad people, don't go with strangers.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 今年我学了不少新词汇。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnnián wǒ xué le bùshǎo xīn cíhuì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette année, j'ai appris pas mal de nouveaux mots.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This year I learned quite a few new words.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎohù dàzìrán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons protéger la nature.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should protect nature.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shíjiān bùgòu, wǒmen děi kuài diǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps ne suffit pas, nous devons nous dépêcher.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There's not enough time, we need to hurry.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng nǐ zài shuō yī jù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez dire encore une phrase.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please say one more sentence.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huǒchē jǐ diǎn dào Běijīng?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À quelle heure le train arrive-t-il à Pékin ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What time does the train arrive in Beijing?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fúwùyuán, qǐng mǎidān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Serveur, l'addition s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Waiter, the bill please.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Dāngshí wǒ háishì gè xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À l'époque, j'étais encore étudiant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: At that time, I was still a student.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xīnzhōng yǒu yī gè mèngxiǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un rêve dans son cœur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a dream in his heart.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gěi wǒ jǔ yī gè lìzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me donner un exemple.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please give me an example.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Túshūguǎn lǐ yào xiǎoshēng shuōhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut parler doucement dans la bibliothèque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should speak quietly in the library.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请走开，我想一个人待着。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zǒukāi, wǒ xiǎng yī gè rén dāi zhe.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez partir, je veux être seul.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please go away, I want to be alone.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng lǚkèmen páiduì shàngchē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les passagers sont priés de faire la queue pour monter.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Passengers please line up to board.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùndòng de shíhou yào chuān qiúxié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut porter des baskets quand on fait du sport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should wear sneakers when exercising.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīqǐ zhàoxiàng ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Prenons une photo ensemble.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's take a photo together.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 人们都喜欢在公园散步。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Rénmen dōu xǐhuan zài gōngyuán sànbù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les gens aiment tous se promener dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: People all like to walk in the park.
